channel.title: Pulse News - Latest News from Kenya and Beyond
channel.description: Stay informed with Pulse News – your trusted source for the latest news and insights from Kenya and around the world. Comprehensive coverage of politics, business, technology, sports, and entertainment.

item.title: Kenya's Economic Recovery Shows Promising Signs in Q4 2024
item.description: Kenya's economy demonstrates resilience with improved GDP growth, reduced inflation, and increased foreign investment in the final quarter of 2024.
item.dc:creator: Pulse News Editorial Team

item.title: Technology Innovation Hub Opens in Nairobi, Creating 5000 Jobs
item.description: A new state-of-the-art technology innovation hub in Nairobi promises to create thousands of jobs and position Kenya as a regional tech leader.
item.dc:creator: Pulse News Editorial Team

item.title: Climate Change Summit: Kenya Leads East African Green Initiative
item.description: Kenya spearheads a groundbreaking environmental initiative at the regional climate summit, focusing on renewable energy and conservation.
item.dc:creator: Pulse News Editorial Team
